title: Teacher Training Program for Strengthening Competencies in Developing Inquiry-Based Science Education Materials

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of middle school-level mathematics and science fundamentals, with limited inquiry-based lesson design experience
context.additional_context: Emphasis on developing inquiry-based science education materials in a blended learning environment using digital devices. A practice-oriented program focused on teacher education material development

learning_goals: Learners can develop activity materials reflecting student idea analysis when designing inquiry-based science lessons
Learners can create teacher guidelines including customized support strategies for assignments and concepts
Learners can produce lesson scenarios incorporating teacher role models during discussions and group activities
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
